title: Implement progressive skill disclosure in CLAUDE.md
description: Per research: 'At session start, agent only receives metadata (name + description). Full SKILL.md loaded only on-demand.' Currently all skill content may bloat context. Implement 3-tier disclosure: names → descriptions → full content.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create ~/.claude/skill-index.md with just skill names (1 line each)
Extract descriptions from SKILL.md frontmatter automatically
Full SKILL.md stays where it is - loaded via Skill tool on-demand
Update global CLAUDE.md to reference skill-descriptions.md (not full skills)
Add instruction: 'Use Skill tool to load full skill when needed'
Script regenerates skill-index.md and skill-descriptions.md from installed skills
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: feat: US-114 implement progressive skill disclosure
